YOUR LIFE IS IN SAFE HANDS

The unexamined life is not worth living. Whereof one cannot speak, thereof one must be silent. Entities should not be multiplied unnecessarily. The life of man (in a state of nature) is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish, and short.
